body_html:
Sorry you're hitting so many problems @bazinac! As a side note, we're moving over active development from the Python scripts you mention to the Graph Transform Tool:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/#quantize_weights

It might be worth trying that approach just to see if there's any difference.

I'll sync with Andrew and get the model files from him, in case there's anything there that helps me understand what's going wrong.

body:
Sorry you're hitting so many problems @bazinac! As a side note, we're moving over active development from the Python scripts you mention to the Graph Transform Tool:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/#quantize_weights

It might be worth trying that approach just to see if there's any difference.

I'll sync with Andrew and get the model files from him, in case there's anything there that helps me understand what's going wrong.
